name: WingSuit
description:
WINGSUIT

-------------

HOW TO PLAY

  • Use the left and the right arrow keys to move.
  • Avoid the objects flying around.
  • Touch the food to take powerups.

POWERUPS

Touch the donut to increase your speed for 4 seconds.  

Touch the cola to scale down your character.

CREDITS

Scripts by AlexxS_

Arts by AlexxS_

Musics by Kubbi (Cascade) and Evan King (Filthy Casuals)
